00001 #include "BoundingBox.h"

00013         BoundingBox::BoundingBox(const Vector2D &topLeft,
00014                 const Vector2D &bottomRight)
00015         {
00016             this->topLeft = topLeft;
00017             this->bottomRight = bottomRight;
00018         }
00019 
00020         BoundingBox::BoundingBox(vector<Vector2D> *points)
00021         {
00022             MathManager *mathManager = MathManager::getInstance();
00023             if(points->size() >= 2) {
00024                 vector<Vector2D>::iterator iterator = points->begin();
00025                 Vector2D first = *iterator;
00026                 iterator++;
00027                 Vector2D second = *iterator;
00028 
00029                 topLeft = Vector2D(mathManager->min<float>(first.getX(),
00030                         second.getX()),
00031                         mathManager->min<float>(first.getY(), second.getY()));
00032                 bottomRight = Vector2D(mathManager->max<float>(
00033                         first.getX(), second.getX()),
00034                         mathManager->max<float>(first.getY(), second.getY()));
00035 
00036                 /* Expand. */
00037                 for(iterator = points->begin(); iterator != points->end();
00038                         iterator++) {
00039                     Vector2D point = *iterator;
00040                     if(point.getX() < topLeft.getX())
00041                         topLeft.setX(point.getX());
00042                     if(point.getX() > bottomRight.getX())
00043                         bottomRight.setX(point.getX());
00044                     if(point.getY() < topLeft.getY())
00045                         topLeft.setY(point.getY());
00046                     if(point.getY() > bottomRight.getY())
00047                         bottomRight.setY(point.getY());
00048                 }
00049             } else {
00050                 LogManager::getInstance()->warning(
00051                         "Boundingbox based on < 2 points."); 
00052             }
00053         }
00054 
00055         BoundingBox::BoundingBox(const BoundingBox &b1, const BoundingBox &b2)
00056         {
00057             topLeft.setX(b1.topLeft.getX() < b2.topLeft.getX() ?
00058                     b1.topLeft.getX() : b2.topLeft.getX());
00059             bottomRight.setX(b1.bottomRight.getX() > b2.bottomRight.getX() ?
00060                     b1.bottomRight.getX() : b2.bottomRight.getX());
00061 
00062             topLeft.setY(b1.topLeft.getY() < b2.topLeft.getY() ?
00063                     b1.topLeft.getY() : b2.topLeft.getY());
00064             bottomRight.setY(b1.bottomRight.getY() > b2.bottomRight.getY() ?
00065                     b1.bottomRight.getY() : b2.bottomRight.getY());
00066         }
00067 
00068         BoundingBox::~BoundingBox()
00069         {
00070         }
00071 
00072         const Vector2D &BoundingBox::getTopLeft() const
00073         {
00074             return topLeft;
00075         }
00076 
00077         const Vector2D &BoundingBox::getBottomRight() const
00078         {
00079             return bottomRight;
00080         }
00081 
00082         bool BoundingBox::hasPoint(const Vector2D &point) const
00083         {
00084             if(point.getX() < topLeft.getX())
00085                 return false;
00086             if(point.getX() > bottomRight.getX())
00087                 return false;
00088             if(point.getY() < topLeft.getY())
00089                 return false;
00090             if(point.getY() > bottomRight.getY())
00091                 return false;
00092             return true;
00093         }
00094 
00095         bool BoundingBox::intersectsWith(BoundingBox *other) const
00096         {
00097             if(topLeft.getX() > other->bottomRight.getX())
00098                 return false;
00099             if(bottomRight.getX() < other->topLeft.getX())
00100                 return false;
00101             if(topLeft.getY() > other->bottomRight.getY())
00102                 return false;
00103             if(bottomRight.getY() < other->topLeft.getY())
00104                 return false;
00105             return true;
00106         }
00107 
00108         bool BoundingBox::intersectsWith(BoundingBox *other, const Vector2D
00109                 &vel1, const Vector2D &vel2) const
00110         {
00111             /* Trivial check. */
00112             if(intersectsWith(other))
00113                 return true;
00114 
00115             /* Reference to do some math. */
00116             MathManager *mathManager = MathManager::getInstance();
00117 
00118             /* Relative movement. Consider this object static, and other as
00119              * moving. */
00120             Vector2D velocity = vel2 - vel1;
00121             float t0, t1, tMinX, tMaxX, tMinY, tMaxY;
00122 
00123             /* X intersection times.  */
00124             if(velocity.getX() == 0.0f) {
00125                 t0 = (bottomRight.getX() - other->topLeft.getX()) /
00126                         velocity.getX();
00127                 t1 = (topLeft.getX() - other->bottomRight.getX()) /
00128                         velocity.getX();
00129                 tMinX = mathManager->min<float>(t0, t1);
00130                 tMaxX = mathManager->max<float>(t0, t1);
00131             } else {
00132                 if(topLeft.getX() < other->bottomRight.getX() &&
00133                         bottomRight.getX() > other->topLeft.getX()) {
00134                     tMinX = 0.0f;
00135                     tMaxX = 1.0f;
00136                 } else {
00137                     return false;
00138                 }
00139             }
00140 
00141             /* Some trivial rejections. */
00142             if(tMaxX < 0.0f)
00143                 return false;
00144             if(tMinX > 1.0f)
00145                 return false;
00146 
00147             /* Y intersection times. */
00148             if(velocity.getY() == 0.0f) {
00149                 t0 = (bottomRight.getY() - other->topLeft.getY()) /
00150                         velocity.getY();
00151                 t1 = (topLeft.getY() - other->bottomRight.getY()) /
00152                         velocity.getY();
00153                 tMinY = mathManager->min<float>(t0, t1);
00154                 tMaxY = mathManager->max<float>(t0, t1);
00155             } else {
00156                 if(topLeft.getY() < other->bottomRight.getY() &&
00157                         bottomRight.getY() > other->topLeft.getY()) {
00158                     tMinY = 0.0f;
00159                     tMaxY = 1.0f;
00160                 } else {
00161                     return false;
00162                 }
00163             }
00164 
00165             /* Some trivial rejections. */
00166             if(tMaxY < 0.0f)
00167                 return false;
00168             if(tMinY > 1.0f)
00169                 return false;
00170 
00171             /* Reject. */
00172             if(tMaxX < tMinY)
00173                 return false;
00174             if(tMinX > tMaxY)
00175                 return false;
00176 
00177             float exact = mathManager->min<float>(tMinX, tMinY);
00178             return exact >= 0.0f && exact <= 1.0f;
00179         }
00180 
00181         bool BoundingBox::completelyIn(BoundingBox *other) const
00182         {
00183             return topLeft.getX() >= other->topLeft.getX() &&
00184                     bottomRight.getX() <= other->bottomRight.getX() &&
00185                     topLeft.getY() >= other->topLeft.getY() &&
00186                     bottomRight.getY() <= other->bottomRight.getY();
00187         }
00188     }
00189 }
